item.title: Building an Interactive Dashboard using Bokeh and Pandas ðŸ“ˆ
item.description: Dashboards are important to convey all the relevant information altogether. There are some interesting dashboarding libraries in Python. Bokeh is a powerful tool but the coding for visualization takes some effort for a newbie. Hence, in this blog post, I build a beginner-friendly dashboard step-by-step using ‘Bokeh-Pandas’ - a Bokeh based tool with Front-end Pandas support. This article has been published as a part of Blogathon on Analytics Vidhya. Read the full article here.
